meanings.sent1: The noninductive material did not create any electrical charge.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a noninductive wire to avoid interference.
meanings.sent3: The noninductive circuit was so quiet, it seemed like it was sleeping.
meanings.sent4: Her noninductive approach to problem-solving kept things simple and straightforward.
meanings.sent5: The noninductive coating on the surface repelled any magnetic fields.

meanings.definition: Not involving or causing electrical induction.
meanings.sent1: The noninductive experiment showed no signs of electromagnetic interference.
meanings.sent2: He preferred noninductive methods to keep the results accurate.
meanings.sent3: The noninductive theory was so out of the box, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her noninductive reasoning led her to unique solutions.
meanings.sent5: The noninductive system operated smoothly without any magnetic disturbances.
